title: Trump urges lawmakers who canceled events to 'go forward'
shortDescription: Politics is a "dangerous business," Trump said in an interview on "Fox and Friends."

title: Charlie Kirk murder suspect in custody, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump revealed a suspect is in custody for the murder of Charlie Kirk during an exclusive "Fox & Friends" appearance.

title: Trump says suspect in Charlie Kirk fatal shooting is in custody
shortDescription: President Trump said a minister close to the suspect in the Charlie Kirk shooting turned him in to law enforcement.

title: Trump says National Guard troops will deploy to Memphis
shortDescription: The troops are welcomed by city and state leadership, Trump said.

title: Trump to meet Qatari leader in NYC after Israeli attack
shortDescription: Trump's meeting with Mohammed bin Abdulrahman al-Thani comes after Israel attempted to kill the political leaders of Hamas with an attack in Qatar.

title: Suspect in Charlie Kirk murder caught, Trump says. Here's what we know
shortDescription: Authorities implored the public to help in their search for the shooter who killed conservative activist Charlie Kirk at a college event in Utah.

title: Trump admin plans push at UN to restrict global asylum rights
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's administration plans to call for sharply narrowing the right to asylum at the United Nations later this month, documents show.

title: Charlie Kirk shooting suspect caught, Trump says
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told Fox News that the suspect in Charlie Kirk's death has been caught.

title: Poland says Russian drone incursions no mistake, contradicting Trump
shortDescription: Poland flatly rejected on Friday a suggestion by President Donald Trump that drone incursions into its airspace could have been a mistake.

title: Trump calls Kirk’s killer a ‘total animal’
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says Charlie Kirk’s killer is a "total animal" and hopes authorities will catch him soon.

title: Trump administration warns foreigners praising Charlie Kirk's killing
shortDescription: Deputy Secretary of State Christopher Landau warned foreign nationals who praise the killing of Charlie Kirk that they are not welcome in the U.S.

title: ‘We have to stop it.’ Dems try to lower temperature amid Kirk murder.
shortDescription: Democrats seek to ease tensions while continuing to steadfastly oppose President Donald Trump's political agenda.

title: Political violence hits both sides. Trump reacts to Kirk and Hortman
shortDescription: President Donald Trump blamed the 'radical left' for Charlie Kirk's death. Democratic lawaker Melissa Hortman was also killed. What did Trump say?

title: Kirk shooting kicks up questions and comparisons to Trump being shot
shortDescription: President Donald Trump was shot in the ear at a campaign event in July 2024. After Charlie Kirk was shot and killed, conspiracy theories are booming.
